items.title: Apply Now - become a Frictionless Data Reproducible Research Fellow
items.summary: Apply today to join the Third Cohort of Frictionless Data Fellows!

items.title: Frictionless Repository
items.summary: Introducing you to Repository, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to automate the validation workflows of your datasets.

items.title: Open Data Blend
items.summary: Open Data Blend  is a set of open data services that aim to make large and complex UK open data easier to analyse.

items.title: A Bittersweet Ending to Frictionless Fellows Cohort 2
items.summary: As a final assignment, the Fellows have written blogs reflecting upon their experiences and what they learned during the programme...

items.title: A Short Case Study Involving Table Schema Frictionless Specs at the European Union
items.summary: The Frictionless specifications are helping with simplifying data validation for applications in production at the European Union.

items.title: Frictionless Data June 2021 Virtual Hangout
items.summary: At our June Frictionless Data community call we had Nikhil Vats giving a presentation on Frictionless Package for InterMine...

items.title: Welcome Livemark - the New Frictionless Data Tool
items.summary: Introducing you to Livemark, the new Frictionless Data tool that allows you to publish data articles easily.

items.title: Announcing New Changes to Our Website
items.summary: We have finished making some new changes that we are very excited to tell you about!
